/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast between nature and urban architecture. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day, which illuminates the scene with natural light and enhances the colors of the cityscape.
